alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 8:28AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Florence and central Darlington Counties through 900 AM EST... At 828 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Timmonsville, or 11 miles southwest of Florence, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Darlington, Timmonsville, Quinby, Sardis, Darlington Raceway, Auburn, Swift Creek, Cartersville, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Mechanicsville, Floyd, Dovesville, Carolinas Hospital System, Mcleod Regional Medical Center, Carolinas Hospital System - Cedar Tower and Health South Rehabilitation Hospital. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 131 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 146 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
